extension.description: CellarDoorTV Wizard allows you to get access to the latest CDTV Custom Builds and more.[CR]Credits - A huge thanks goes out to [COLOR deepskyblue]Surfacingx[/COLOR] the creator of the Aftermath Wizard for bringing this outstanding Wizard to this community.[CR]Contact - For help and support go to CDTV Builds Facebook group.[CR]Follow me on Twitter @CellarDoorTV1 for the latest updates - Thank you.

extension.summary: Put all your favourites bits of all your favourites addons into one easy to use addon.
extension.description: Super Favourites is a better way of managing your Kodi Favourites.[CR][CR]Virtually any menu item within Kodi can be added to Super Favourites, even from addons that don't normally provide this feature.[CR][CR]Super Favourites allows you to better manage your Kodi favourites, including the creation of sub-folders, into which your Kodi favourites can then be copied or moved into.[CR][CR]This allows you to create you own custom addon with just the best bits of your favourite addons. Search your favourite addons, play your favourite music, read your favourite comic strips, select your favourite playlists, browse your favourite movies, listen to your favourite radio stations, watch your favourite cartoons, the possibilities are endless, all from within one easy to use addon.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991

extension.summary: SoundCloud е платформа за разпространяване на аудио.
SoundCloud is an online audio distribution platform.
SoundCloud est une plateforme de streaming audio en ligne.
סאונדקלאוד הוא פלטפורמת הפצת אודיו באינטרנט.
SoundCloud is een online audio distributie platform.
extension.description: SoundCloud е платформа за разпространение на аудио, която позволява на потребителите да качват, записват, представят и споделят звуците създадени от тях.
SoundCloud is an online audio distribution platform that enables its users to upload, record, promote and share their originally-created sounds.
Soundcloud ist ein Online-Audio-Vertriebsplattform. Benutzer können ihre ursprünglich erstelle Music hochladen, aufnehmen und unter weiteren Benutzern teilen.
SoundCloud est une plateforme de streaming audio en ligne qui permet aux utilisateurs d'envoyer, d'enregistrer, de promouvoir et partager leurs créations audio originales.
סאונדקלאוד הוא פלטפורמה הפצת אודיו מקוונת המאפשרת למשתמשים שלה להעלות, להקליט, לקדם ולשתף את היצירות שלהם.
SoundCloud is een online audio distributie platform dat gebruikers in staat stelt om hun eigen muziekcreaties te uploaden, opnemen, promoten en te delen.

extension.summary: CDTV Easy to Pair Menu System
extension.description: Small Simple Script for CDTV Menu System

This script offers various possibilities to display online content inside skins as well as a complete MovieDB browser including info dialogs for various media types. Used services are themoviedb.org, theaudiodb.org, Trakt.TV, omdbapi.com and a lot more. Needs skin implementation for lot of functions. Uses [COLOR limegreen]M[/COLOR]etalli[COLOR limegreen]Q[/COLOR] 4[COLOR limegreen]Q[/COLOR]ed for playback and library functions.

Dit script biedt meerdere mogelijkheden om online content weer te geven in skins en bevat ook een complete MovieDB browser inclusief info dialogen voor verscheidene media types. Gebruikte diensten zijn themoviedb.org, theaudiodb.org, Trakt.TV, omdbapi.com en nog veel meer. Vereist skin implementatie voor de meeste functies. Gebruikt [COLOR limegreen]M[/COLOR]etalli[COLOR limegreen]Q[/COLOR] 4[COLOR limegreen]Q[/COLOR]ed voor afspeel en bibliotheek functies.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 2, June 1991

extension.summary: Mutagen is a Python module to handle audio metadata.
extension.description: Mutagen is a Python module to handle audio metadata. It supports ASF, FLAC, M4A, Monkey's Audio, MP3, Musepack, Ogg Opus, Ogg FLAC, Ogg Speex, Ogg Theora, Ogg Vorbis, True Audio, WavPack and OptimFROG audio files. All versions of ID3v2 are supported, and all standard ID3v2.4 frames are parsed. It can read Xing headers to accurately calculate the bitrate and length of MP3s. ID3 and APEv2 tags can be edited regardless of audio format. It can also manipulate Ogg streams on an individual packet/page level.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991
